item.title: Convert XLS/XLSX to CSV in Bash
Running Script on Cluster (StarCluster)
item.description: Start a new cluster with the configuration file you modified: starcluster start cluster_name Send the script to the running cluster: starcluster put cluster_name myscr.csh /home/myscr.csh Run it using source: starcluster sshmaster cluster_name "source /home/myscr.csh >& /home/myscr.log"

item.title: How To Make A File or Script Executable in Ubuntu
item.description: Start terminal CTRL + Alt + T can be used (or just go to Dash Home and type Terminal): Run this command below: sudo chmod +x /path/to/your/file Source
